name: Drying

pages.text: The $(thing)Drying Mat$() is used to dry items. It is made with $(thing)Fruit Leaves$(), which are obtained from breaking the leaves of $(thing)Fruit Trees$().
The recipe for the drying mat.
To use the drying mat, place it out on the sun and add an item to it with $(item)$(k:key.use)$(). After a half day, it will be dried. If it rains, the drying process must start over.
The solar drier functions the same as the drying mat, but 12x as fast.
Drying fruit is a common use of the drying mat. Dried fruit is used in some recipes, and lasts longer.
Tofu is made using a drying mat.
Cinnamon is made using a drying mat.
